user_instruction: 'Tell John to reply to me (emily@innovatenow.com) with his thoughts on potential collaboration, and remind him he can check his Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Follow-up on Potential Collaboration Opportunities

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. When you have a moment, could you please share your thoughts on how TechSolutions Inc. and InnovateNow might collaborate? I’m eager to hear your ideas and explore next steps together.

For reference, you can review the background materials in your Gmail and Notion workspace.

Many thanks, and I look forward to your reply.

Best regards,

Emily  
Business Development Manager  
InnovateNow  
emily@innovatenow.com

final_output:
